title: Episode 29 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: A review of Episode 29 discussing how the fight between Luffy and Don Krieg showcases Luffy's growth as a fighter who can strategize. The review highlights the episode's significance in marking the end of the Baratie Arc's problems.

title: The One Piece Podcast
author: The One Piece Podcast Team
description: Long-running One Piece podcast that has covered episodes from the early series. While no specific Episode 29 episode was found, this podcast has discussed the Baratie Arc extensively.

title: Sunny Go One Piece Podcast
author: Sunny Go Podcast Team
description: A podcast that rewatches One Piece episodes in batches of 3, discussing thoughts, themes, and manga-anime differences in a spoiler-free manner.

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: A podcast where 3 friends dive deep into One Piece, with 2 first-time viewers recording their reactions.
